title: Governor Sindh calls on Caretaker PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 15 (APP): Governor Sindh Kamran Khan Tessori on Tuesday called on Caretaker Prime Minister Anwaar-ul-Haq Kakar.
The governor congratulated the caretaker prime minister on assuming his office and expressed his best wishes, PM Office Media Wing said in a press release.
During the meeting, Senator Sarfraz Bugti was also present.
The prime minister thanked the governor Sindh for his good wishes.
